Chancellor.description: Has executive control in the Government. Is essentially the face of the region and governs all events that occur within the region.
Chancellor.name: New Woking

Foreign Minister.description: The Foreign Minister is in control of maintaining and creating diplomatic relations with other regions. This is mainly done through embassies.
Foreign Minister.name: Austrian Hasburgs

Local Minister.description: The Local Minister is in charge of ensuring that all internal events go smoothly and present Norrland in a positive manner. This can be through RP events or moderation.
Local Minister.name: New-Indochina
